entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle. High 14 except 9 along parts of the coast. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Periods of drizzle beginning this evening then changing to showers before morning. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
